original_title: Russia carries out its biggest attack in more than a month while accusing Ukraine of not being interested in peace | CNN
article_summary: "Russia intensifies drone and missile attacks on Ukraine, killing nine civilians, amidst ongoing peace talks between Ukraine, US, and Russia. Attacks include striking an American-owned manufacturing company, Flex Ltd., in Zakarpattia, causing injuries. Ukraine seeks a ceasefire and security guarantees before negotiations with Russia, while Russia remains noncommittal about a bilateral meeting."</s>
